question: United Nations (UN) has urged which bloc to set up an emergency task force to prepare a "Global Vaccination Plan" against Covid-19?
explanation:
The United Nations Secretary-General Antonio Guterres proposed that the G-20 association set up an emergency task force to prepare a "Global Vaccination Plan" against Covid-19.
As per the UN, this task force should include all countries that are capable of developing vaccines or to produce them, along with vaccination organisations, other technical organisations and international financial institutions.
